Exaggerate: The claim does not appear to exaggerate the occurrence of tornadoes in Cape Town, South Africa. It simply states that videos show tornadoes in the area.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the statement that tornadoes occurred in Cape Town, South Africa.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there were no reports of any tornadoes in Cape Town, South Africa on the given date, as stated by South African news outlet Times LIVE.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the videos showing tornadoes in Cape Town, South Africa are genuine, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanation for the videos showing tornadoes in Cape Town, South Africa.
